version_name: 14 SP2-Added webmeeting QuickLink icon to launch 3CX WebMeeting App-Removed the Copy WebRTC link icon from top-right corner of the display-Fixed bug of phone changing profile to “In a GSM Call” when you receive a GSM call and not changing status back to A

version_description:
Optimized for iPhone6 and iPhone6+
Updated icons for retina display
Fixed incoming push notifications wrongly marked as "missed calls"
Fixed Resume a held call while in attended transfer mode
Search now working in Contacts and Presence
Cont
Fixed queue notification icon.

- Fixed issue on UTF languages input on chat
- Fixed issue with PNP request when no account configured
- Fixed application crash due to Copy/Paste a number from Call History
- Fixed application crash due placing the phone to background from Set
Fixed a bug in the HTTP communication channel.
Minor fixes.
Faster connection to V15 3CXPhoneSystem.

- fixed calls ending sometimes after 30 seconds
- fixed potential crash occuring when call ends on locked screen
- fixed lost "sound preview" for chat notification sounds
- fixed tab-bar sometimes appearing as "floating" on iPad
- fixed CallKi

- added support for IPv6 (requires PBX V15)
- added support for push chat messages (requires PBX V15)
- added support to show Queue/Ring prefix on incoming push call (requires PBX V15)
- added support for x-call-control (requires PBX V15)
- a

- added support for contact images provided by the PBX (requires V15.5)
- added long press on status image/icon to quick set profile status message
- added Trash button to delete call history
- presence now is displayed in extension+name format s

- fixed client wrongly auto-answering sometime ring/queue calls
- fixed a very old random crash occurring when closing the Accounts view
- fixed brief disconnection due to appearance of APIPA (169.254.x.x) local interface
- fixed SIP FQDN resolve

- added Call Quality indicator on the display
- added support for QR provisioning (require V15.5 SP2)
- added support for pause/resume call recording (require V15.5 SP1)
- added forward to ring group/queues voicemail feature (require V15.5 SP2)

-fixed "Unsupported PBX" warning message wrongly shown for V15
-fixed a crash occurring when SIP registers on slower connections
-fixed Record button wrongly enabled in call Dialing state
-added support for English (UK) language

- fixed ad-hoc conference handling
- fixed client wrongly auto calling-back a missed call
- fixed PnP not activating provisioned account
- fixed a crash in PnP provisioning
- fixed Danish and Chinese translations
- updated SIP IPv6 support<

- improved ad-hoc Conference handling
- fixed "anonymous" incoming push calls not being displayed properly by CallKit
- added support for contact images in chat window.

- reverted conference handling to pre-SP2 (with small UI fixes)
- allow chat keyboard to be dismissed by swiping down
- faster number/contact matching
- improved IPv6 tunnel support
- greatly reduced app size, to only ~9MB
- fixed critical

- fixed incoming PUSH (calls, chat, missed calls) sometimes being ignored and not displayed
- fixed a bug which programmatically disabled PUSH (call, chat, missed calls)
- fixed PUSH call continues to ring sometimes after call ends
- fixed call b

- PUSH is faster and incoming calls are displayed quicker
- Added Add Contact menu item in Recents list
- Added Call via GSM menu item in Contact details
- Added View Options in Presence
- Added "tweet" if a GSM/FaceTime call is incoming whil

- faster PUSH call ending when call is answered elsewhere
- fixed bridges/groups refresh/sorting in Presence
- fixed Speaker button not working on iOS 11.3 if jack headphones are used
- fixed a crash which may occur when declining a PUSH call

- fixed PUSH ringtone issue when "also ring my mobile" is enabled
- fixed bad audio quality for some Bluetooth devices
- fixed some cases when GSM call is automatically put on hold on incoming SIP call
- fixed first/lastname/company being lost wh

-increased version number to 16.0.1
-fixed IPv6 issue in tunnel
-fixed search bar disappearing when double-tapped
-fixed account name overlapping the line "On Hook" status
-fixed "Also Ring My Mobile" switch being incorrectly enabled
-fixed
Warning message informing users that a major update is coming soon.

Full redesign of 3CX Chat. It’s look is now more messenger like.
“Chat” is now called “Messages”
Added an unread message counter.
Moved the “More” menu and replaced it with a slide-in navigation button located at the top left of the app.
Where

- faster launch and reconnect
- added OPUS codec
- faster and smoother Recents display
- added Apple's UI refresh control in Recents (by swiping-holding down the list)
- support for upcoming V15.5 SP6 PUSH
- fixed wrong call start/connect d

Full redesign of 3CX Chat. It’s look is now more messenger like.
“Chat” is now called “Messages”
Added an unread message counter.
Moved the “More” menu and replaced it with a slide-in navigation button located at the top left of the app.
Where

-increased version number to 16.0.1
-fixed IPv6 issue in tunnel
-fixed search bar disappearing when double-tapped
-fixed account name overlapping the line "On Hook" status
-fixed "Also Ring My Mobile" switch being incorrectly enabled
-fixed
Warning message informing users that a major update is coming soon.

This new version of the 3CX app not only gives you the tools needed to make and receive calls from anywhere, but you can also video call and chat with its new rich-chat features. This, together with an upgraded notification system makes the iOS App your o

- Renamed client display name from "3cxphone" to "3CX"
- Added ability to call a chat participant by tapping the avatar
- Show "Search in Contacts" when performing blind/attended transfer
- Fixed connection stability on 3G/LTE
- Fixed incoming

- Fixed: compatibility issues with iOS 14
- Fixed: tunnel not reconnecting after a pause in internet traffic
- Fixed: issue with tunnel port malformed in via
- Fixed: issue with conference search
- Fixed: Show only local extensions in Forwardi

- fixed adding a new account by "+" not working on iOS 14
- fixed Conference Scheduler view appearing blank on iOS 14
- fixed voicemail prefix not being shown on "Leave Voicemail" in extension details
- fixed voicemail player always playing on sp

- Fixed one-way audio on video call with Web Client
- Fixed Recordings showing trunk number instead of caller ID
- Fixed iOS14 chat notification being shown even if the same conversation view is shown
- Fixed attempts to save an empty External Nu

- Fixed calls failing if account name contains invalid SIP characters
- Fixed contact avatars in Chats not being shown first time when app starts
- Fixed creating chat with bridged extension failing when SMS support is enabled
- Fixed Search fiel
